revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Nineteen Sermons on Several Occasions. By John Rogers, D.D. Late Vicar of St. Giles, Cripplegate, Sub-Dean and Canon of Wells, and Chaplain in Ordinary to his Maje..."
revision.text: Possibly: Nineteen Sermons on Several Occasions. By John Rogers, D.D. Late Vicar of St. Giles, Cripplegate, Sub-Dean and Canon of Wells, and Chaplain in Ordinary to his Majesty. To which is prefixed, The Author's Life, with an Elogium written by John Burton, B.D. Fellow of Eton College. (London : Printed for G. Robinson, in Paternoster-row, M.DCC.LXXXIV. [1784]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2411887~S1. Possibly also: http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2411889~S1 OR http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2411890~S1
